snippet: The British rider Geraint Thomas withstood a strong challenge from the two-time Tour de France champion Alberto Contador on the mountainous seventh and final stage at Nice, France, to win the Paris-Nice race for the first time.
abstract: British bicyclist Geraint Thomas wins Paris-Nice race.
lead_paragraph: The British rider Geraint Thomas withstood a strong challenge from the two-time Tour de France champion Alberto Contador on the mountainous seventh and final stage at Nice, France, to win the Paris-Nice race for the first time.
